name: quietavenue
description: react serverside rendering website with hydration
author: betoluco

scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run client-build && npm run server-build
scripts.mirror: NODE_ENV=development npm run client-build && npm run server-build && npm run upload-assets

scriptsComments.start: Starts the react application and runs it on the browser (react-script start)
scriptsComments.test: Runs all frontEnd test using vitest
scriptsComments.prod: Runs client-build and server-build scripts consecutively in a production environment
scriptsComments.mirror: Does the same as prod script but using a test environment, also runs upload-assets script
scriptsComments.client-build: Build a css and js bundle files for the browser and grabs and hash and all the images required. The files are stored on clientBuild folder
scriptsComments.server-build: Builds a js bundle file and and grabs and hash all the file from clientBuild folder  that the bundle requires (css, js , images). The files are stored in frontEndBundle folder
scriptsComments.clear-assets: Deletes all the files inside the S3 root/staticAssets folder
scriptsComments.upload-assets: Uploads all the files located in quietavenue/frontEndBundle/staticAssets to S3 root/staticAssets folder
